format = """\
[î‚¶](bg:#030B16 fg:#7DF9AA)\

[directory]
format = "[ ï¼ $path ]($style)"
style = "fg:#000000 bg:#6699cc"

[git_branch]
format = '[ $symbol$branch(:$remote_branch) ]($style)'
symbol = "îœ‰ ï˜ "

[git_status]
ahead = "â‡¡${count} "
diverged = "â‡¡${ahead_count}â‡£${behind_count} "

modified = "!${count} "
untracked = "?${count} "
staged = "+${count} "
format = '[$all_status]($style)'

[hg_branch]
format = "[ $symbol$branch ]($style)"
symbol = "ï˜ "

[cmd_duration]
format = "[ â—· $duration ]($style)"

[character]
success_symbol = '[ âœ](bold green) '

[time]
disabled = false
time_format = "%R" # Hour:Minute Format
style = "bg:#1d2230"
format = '[[ ó±‘ $time ](bg:#1C3A5E fg:#8DFBD2)]($style)'
